Class GraphingManager

java.lang.Object
graphing.GraphingManager
public class GraphingManager extends Object
Manages the graphing of stock data by maintaining the current dataset and delegating drawing tasks to GraphPlotter.

This class acts as a controller to manage multiple stock data sets, define the drawing area, and request plotting on a Processing PApplet canvas.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GraphingManager()
    Constructs a new GraphingManager with an empty data list and a default graph drawing rectangle.

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphingManager

      public GraphingManager()
      Constructs a new GraphingManager with an empty data list and a default graph drawing rectangle.

      The default graph box is set to (x=100, y=100, width=800, height=400) but can be changed via setGraphBox(Rectangle).

  • Method Details

    • setGraphBox

      public void setGraphBox(Rectangle graphBox)
      Sets the rectangular area on the screen where the graph will be drawn.
      Parameters:
      graphBox - a Rectangle defining the drawing bounds of the graph

    • setStockData

      public void setStockData(ArrayList<StockData> dataList)
      Replaces the current list of stock data sets with the provided list.
      Parameters:
      dataList - the list of StockData objects to be plotted

    • addStockData

      public void addStockData(StockData data)
      Adds a single StockData set to the current list of data to be plotted.
      Parameters:
      data - the StockData object to add

    • clearData

      public void clearData()
      Clears all currently stored stock data sets.

    • plotStockData

      public void plotStockData(ArrayList<StockData> list, processing.core.PApplet sketch, Rectangle graphBox)
      Draws the provided list of stock data graphs on the given Processing sketch within the specified graph drawing area.

      This method delegates actual rendering to the GraphPlotter instance.

      Parameters:
      list - the list of StockData to plot
      sketch - the Processing PApplet to use for drawing
      graphBox - the Rectangle area defining where to draw the graph
